mapper.delete: DELETE from shared_info where id=${id} and releaseID=${uid};
mapper.select: select r.id rdcID, r.name,r.provinceid,r.cityid, r.address from rdc r where 1=1 and r.userid=#{userid} GROUP BY r.id ORDER BY r.addtime desc

SELECT s.id, s.rdcID, s.typeText, s.dataType, s.releaseID, s.title, s.unitPrice, s.unit, s.unit1, s.unit2, s.typeCode, s.typeText, s.sqm, s.telephone, s.note, date_format(s.validStartTime,'%Y-%m-%d') validStartTime, date_format(s.validEndTime,'%Y-%m-%d') validEndTime, s.applyID, s.bookings, s.stauts,s.detlAddress, r. NAME, r.address, r.coldtype, (SELECT location FROM filedata f WHERE f.belongid = r.id AND f.category = 'storagePic' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS logo FROM shared_info s LEFT JOIN rdc r ON s.rdcID = r.id WHERE s.id =#{id} GROUP BY s.id ORDER BY s.updatetime DESC

SELECT s.id, s.rdcID, s.dataType, s.releaseID, s.title, s.unitPrice, s.unit1, s.typeText, s.sqm, date_format(s.validStartTime,'%Y-%m-%d') validStartTime, date_format(s.validEndTime,'%Y-%m-%d') validEndTime, s.applyID, s.bookings, s.stauts,s.detlAddress,
r. NAME, r.address, r.coldtype, (SELECT location FROM filedata f WHERE f.belongid = r.id AND f.category = 'storagePic' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS logo FROM shared_info s LEFT JOIN rdc r ON s.rdcID = r.id WHERE s.stauts = #{sstauts} and s.id in (${id}) and s.typeCode=#{type} and s.dataType in (${dataType}) and s.title like '%${keyword}%' and r.id in (${rdcID}) GROUP BY s.id ORDER BY s.updatetime DESC

SELECT s.id, s.rdcID, s.releaseID, s.title, s.unitPrice, s.unit1, s.typeText, s.sqm, m.type_name codeLave1, date_format(s.validStartTime,'%Y-%m-%d') validStartTime, date_format(s.validEndTime,'%Y-%m-%d') validEndTime, s.applyID, s.bookings, s.stauts,s.detlAddress, r.address, r. NAME, (SELECT location FROM filedata f WHERE f.belongid = s.id AND f.category ='sharePic' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS logo FROM shared_info s LEFT JOIN rdc r ON s.rdcID = r.id LEFT JOIN comm_mata_data m ON s.codeLave1=m.type_code and m.source_type='good_type'
WHERE s.stauts = #{sstauts} and s.releaseID=#{releaseID} and s.dataType=#{datatype} and s.rdcID=#{rdcID} and s.typeCode=#{type} and s.title like '%${keyword}%' and s.provinceid = #{provinceid} and s.codeLave1 in (${goodtype}) GROUP BY s.id ORDER BY s.updatetime DESC

SELECT s.id, s.rdcID, s.releaseID, s.title, s.unit1, s.unit2, s.typeText, s.applyID, s.bookings, s.stauts, s.detlAddress, IFNULL( date_format(s.validStartTime,'%Y-%m-%d'),s.validStartTime)validStartTime, IFNULL( date_format(s.validEndTime, '%Y-%m-%d' ),s.validEndTime) validEndTime, (SELECT type_name FROM comm_mata_data f WHERE f.source_type='ps_fm_type' and f.type_code=s.codeLave1 LIMIT 1 )codeLave1, (select type from storagetruck k where k.id=s.codeLave3 LIMIT 1 ) codeLave3, (SELECT location FROM filedata f WHERE f.belongid = s.id AND f.category ='sharePic' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) logo FROM shared_info s LEFT JOIN rdc r ON s.rdcID = r.id WHERE s.stauts = #{sstauts} and s.dataType=#{datatype} and s.rdcID=#{rdcID}
and s.typeCode=#{type} and s.title like '%${keyword}%' and s.codeLave3 in (${carType}) and s.codeLave1 in (${businessType}) and s.codeLave2 in(${storagetempertype}) and s.stprovinceID in(${stprovinceID}) and s.stcityID in(${stcityID}) and s.toprovinceID in(${toprovinceID}) and s.tocityID in(${tocityID}) and ( s.validStartTime <=#{validStartTime} AND s.validEndTime >=#{validEndTime} ) GROUP BY s.id ORDER BY s.updatetime DESC
